mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students (fullName, furigana, nickName, email, region, age, gender, remark, isDeleted) VALUES (#{fullName}, #{furigana}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{region}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{remark}, false)
MERGE INTO student_courses (studentId, courses, start_date, end_date) KEY (studentId) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{courses}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE students SET fullName = #{fullName}, furigana = #{furigana}, nickName = #{nickName}, email = #{email}, region = #{region}, age = #{age}, gender = #{gender}, remark = #{remark}, isDeleted = #{isDeleted} WHERE studentId = #{studentId}
